reviewText: This was a Christmas gift and I had to wait until the recipient got back to me regarding tape quality and content.  The tape is in good condition and had been viewed several times since Christmas with lots of laughs each time.

The Bob Newhart show is another comedy classic from the MTM stable. Bob Newhart plays a psyciatrist, and all sorts of laughs are provided by both his work colleagues and also his patients. Suzanne Pleshette plays Bob's  wife in the series. The Bob Newhart Show is a first class comedy. Bob  Newhart's other tv series include 'Newhart' and 'Bob'
